post.body: Had a crazy time in Vermont last year. Denny's must not serve your AA light amber! http://bit.ly/dDy0
Being a blog consultant would be pretty cool, too! And you get better maple syrup.
Hi! I'm an advertising professor and cognitive scientist who runs a psychophysiology lab at Texas Tech. Nice to meet you.
auspicious?
Thanks twice. Sadly, I need about double, 150. I only got serious last week. Hopefully good social media books will also ensue!
But perhaps I can send you BH souvenirs one day as a bribe to speak to one of my classes via Skype, etc.
Thanks for the shout out. Behaving oneself is overrated.
I'm going to take a wild guess and say Buddy Holly and not one of the Dixie Chicks. Come for visit. I'll take you to museum.
Come on. All that beautiful cotton. The windmills. OK, you're right. It's a rough drive.
Is Lubbock out of the back yard?
True a lot of advertising is dumb. But social media are changing the measured media paradigm (cliche!) very quickly.
Hospital craziness is amazing. Get well soon.
Thanks for the Tweet shout out!
@brokenlimits needs a follow.
Purchased Thesis theme today. Keeping hosting on Web.com for now (had other stuff there for years). http://bit.ly/TSXl
As a native Kansas Citian, I am very jealous of your Bryants trip. But not that line!
Classics never go out of style. Wii Sports is nice because beginners can have success. Except for baseball. I can't hit.
OK social media types. Need your help. Teaching graduate class on Advertising & the Consumer. What is must read material? @, DM, or RT plz.
Twitterholic.com says I'm the 10th ranked Twitterer in Lubbock. All I want is 180 more followers for New Year's. :)
Freakishly warm for the day after Christmas. Too bad for the wind.
